Traits.Name: Dreadful Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of the Hollow Eyed Woman and can see her must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Memory Drain
Traits.Content: Whenever a creature is frightened by the Hollow Eyed Woman, it must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or lose the ability to recall its last memory. This effect lasts until the creature finishes a short or long rest.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Hollow Eyed Woman's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells: At will: chill touch, minor illusion. 3/day each: fear, phantasmal force, detect thoughts.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hollow Eyed Woman makes two Spectral Touch attacks.

Actions.Name: Spectral Touch
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 6) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Terrifying Visage (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Hollow Eyed Woman radiates an aura of dread in a 30-foot radius centered on herself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw, taking 42 (10d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, on a failed save, creatures are frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Rejuvenating Gaze
Actions.Content: When a creature within 30 feet makes a successful saving throw against being frightened, the Hollow Eyed Woman can use her reaction to regain 15 hit points.
